heading: HR01363
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE  TO REVIEW THE CONCESSION AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE METROPOLITAN WATERWORKS AND SEWERAGE SYSTEM (MWSS) AND WATER CONCESSIONAIRE WHICH PRIVATIZED WATER SERVICES AND RESULTED TO INCESSANT WATER RATE HIKES IN MANILA ARISING FROM THE FOREIGN CURRENCY DIFFERENTIAL ADJUSTMENTS (FCDA) AND ITS EFFECTS AMONGST STAKEHOLDERS
principal-authors: BROSAS, ARLENE D.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.;
status: Pending with the Committee on GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION since 2018-02-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01363
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO REVIEW THE CONCESSION AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE METROPOLITAN WATERWORKS AND SEWERAGE SYSTEM (MWSS) AND WATER CONCESSIONAIRE WHICH PRIVATIZED WATER SERVICES AND RESULTED TO INCESSANT WATER RATE HIKES IN MANILA ARISING FROM THE FOREIGN CURRENCY DIFFERENTIAL ADJUSTMENTS (FCDA) AND ITS EFFECTS AMONGST STAKEHOLDERS
